Usman Saif

With over 8 years of software development experience, I specialize in crafting innovative solutions using Linux, Apache, MySQL, PHP, Laravel, and Vue.js (2 & 3). As a seasoned team lead, I have a proven track record of guiding full-stack developers to ensure seamless collaboration and timely project delivery. My expertise extends to front-end development, where I leverage Vue.js and state management libraries to design intuitive, user-centric web applications. For the past 6 years, I have led the development and maintenance of a prominent U.S.-based e-commerce platform. Built from the ground up with Laravel and Vue.js 2, this large-scale application efficiently manages millions of records, showcasing my ability to handle complex, high-performance systems.
